record.title: APPROPRIATIONS COMMITTEE ON RULES OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, pursuant to rule XXVI, paragraph 2, of the Standing Rules of the Senate, I ask unanimous consent to have the attached rules and subcommittee memberships for the 110th Congress printed in the CONGRESSIONAL RECORD.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the material was ordered to be printed in the RECORD, as follows:
